Package com.cratediggers.dao

Class AlbumDAO

java.lang.Object
com.cratediggers.dao.JpaDAO<Album>
com.cratediggers.dao.AlbumDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericDAO<Album>
public class AlbumDAO
extends JpaDAO<Album>
implements GenericDAO<Album>
Album data access object class used to implement database interaction for album table. Extends JpaDAO and implements GenericDAO.

    • sortAlphabetically

      private java.util.ArrayList<Album> sortAlphabetically​(java.util.ArrayList<Album> listAlbums)
      Sorts a list of customers alphabetically. Utilises merge sort.
      Parameters:
      listCustomers - to be sorted
      Returns:
      Sorted list

    • mergeSort

      private java.util.ArrayList<Album> mergeSort​(java.util.ArrayList<Album> listAlbums, int left, int right)
      Recursively finds the mid point to split and merge sorts halves separately. Then merges each half of customer list in alphabetical.
      Parameters:
      listAlbums - to be sorted
      left - starting index of list to be merge sorted
      right - end index of list to be merge sorted
      Returns:
      Partially sorted list of customers if incomplete, full sorted list of customers when complete.

    • merge

      private java.util.ArrayList<Album> merge​(java.util.ArrayList<Album> listAlbums, int left, int mid, int right)
      Merges two sublists of listAlbums, ordered alphabetically. First subarray is from index left to mid. Second subarray is from index mid+1 to right.
      Parameters:
      listAlbums - to be sorted
      left - specifies location of first subarray
      mid - specifies location of both first and second subarrays
      right - specifies location of second subarray
      Returns:
      Merged list of customers

    • findByTitle

      public Album findByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
      Retrieves a specific album record within the database by title. Linear search.
      Parameters:
      title - of record to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Album object corresponding to found record

    • listByGenre

      public java.util.List<Album> listByGenre​(int genreId)
      Retrieves a list of album records within the database that contain a specific genre. Linear search.
      Parameters:
      genreId - foreign key to be searched for
      Returns:
      List of album objects that contain the specified genreId foreign key

    • search

      public java.util.List<Album> search​(java.lang.String keyword)
      Searches all album records within the database for a list of album objects that contain a specified keyword. Album title, description, artist name and genre name are checked. If any contain the keyword specified the album object is appended to the returned list. Not case sensitive.
      Parameters:
      keyword - to be searched for in album records
      Returns:
      List of album records that contain the specified keyword

    • contains

      private boolean contains​(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String sub)
      Checks if a given string contains a given substring.
      Parameters:
      str - string to be checked
      sub - substring to be searched for
      Returns:
      true if string contains substring, false if not

    • listNewAlbums

      public java.util.List<Album> listNewAlbums()
      Lists the 4 newest albums only by release date.
      Returns:
      List of newest album objects of size 4
